description: This file defines a `RequestContext` class which manages per-thread user ID context for audit purposes in a web application. It provides methods to set, retrieve, and clear the current user ID, utilizing ThreadLocal storage to maintain thread safety. The class is marked as a Spring component, indicating it can be injected and managed within the Spring framework.

classes.name: RequestContext
classes.description: A request-scoped context component that stores the user ID for the current thread, allowing retrieval and setting of user ID for auditing purposes.

methods.name: setCurrentUserId
methods.description: Sets the user ID for the current thread context. Defaults to 'system' if the input is null or blank.

methods.name: getCurrentUserId
methods.description: Retrieves the user ID for the current thread context, or returns 'system' if not set.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Removes the user ID associated with the current thread, clearing the context.
